website_summaries.verdict: Top-rated for its high IP- and military-grade ratings, it’s a solid choice for globetrotters who need an all-weather, all-terrain phone.
pros: Has an IP68/IPK69 rating, which means the phone can be immersed in 2 meters of water
Functions without interruption in environments ranging from -4°F to 140°F
Sustains impact and shock far better than competitors given its performance in tests with blunt and sharp objects
cons: Finger reader may require you to remove your gloves, making it somewhat of an inconvenient feature in plunging temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Best phone per dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device! Comes with every goodie you could need. Attachable antenna for walkie talkie if you want to communicate with ET. MASSIVE 10,000 mAh battery. Yes fellas size does matter. Will go 3 days with regular use before you need a charge. Comes with two screwdrivers so you can attach a clip on the back and to remove a cover to put in a SIM card or sd memory. You can even drop, throw and submerge (all tested involuntary LOL) I think the only thing that can break it is if I call my mother. (Don't show her this) (She's a lovely lady)
customer_reviews.author: Trash King

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised. It delivers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an S9....this phone is by far better. Better signal, response, call clarity, crisp execution of interface. This operates leaps and bounds ahead of the 800$ phones that are sold by big brands.... Oh it's also extremely durable waterproof and the battery is over 10k miliamps. I highly recommend if your sick of getting mediocre performance from top dollar brands. FYI they are all manufactured in China lol. Ulefone is doing well for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works with my T-Mobile account. Takes good pics and videos. It's solid device. Not sure but it looks like I can buy the 3wt antenna on ebay for $10, and down load the walkie talki app. Will repost if it works. Other than that there are no complaints about this phone. The battery is amazingly good. Charged it all the way 3 days ago, and it's still at 61% all phones should have batteries like this. The price is the best part. There phones could easily be sold for twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: This phone is for real!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long-time HTC owner/user/enthusiast, and my last HTC lasted 5 years. However, due to the recent death spiral of that company, and the significantly degraded battery in my last HTC, I was looking for a new phone. I discovered the Ulefone Armor 3W. It was not overpriced, and based on other ratings, I decided to invest. I'm very happy that I did. This phone is anchored in Android 9.0 and performs well. It is highly configurable, and the extraordinary battery life has made me very satisfied. I'll continue to update this review as time passes, but as of almost 4 weeks in, I'm entirely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great battery , rugged and reliable .
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems with my iPhone in general ( the batter drained very fast and at the very end my iPhone did not recognize my cellular network ) . The Apple senior advisor just had me repeat what I already trouble shorted myself , no answers so I was tired of getting no where . I was looking for a rigged and reliable phone, I found that in the Ulfone 3w . The battery is excellent - 3 days on 1 charge and battery percent is still at 53% .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool phone but too big
customer_reviews.text: This phone had so many goodies in the box but was unfortunately WAY too thick (that's what she said). The battery life seemed great, and it has a nice, fast processor. But it was awkward to hold and it was too heavy in the hands (that's what she said).
customer_reviews.author: Andres C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery lies
customer_reviews.text: Phone doesnt charge fast, put it on charger before bed at 20% woke up 7hours later and it's only at 82% . Phone also doesnt last even 2 days on a full charge with very little use, other than that I like the phone
customer_reviews.author: James e.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Less rugged than you think
customer_reviews.text: Rugged but does not stand up cosmetically. Metallic side bumpers. Fingerprint reader extremely sensitive and does not register consistently. User interface fast but basic. Fell on the belt clip getting out of my car a that is low and shattered the screen. Camera no longer focuses after less than six months.
customer_reviews.author: Randomwizdom

customer_reviews.title: The phone is not compatible with verizon, sprint and many others
customer_reviews.text: This cell phone is a rip off, don't buy it. It is a total scam. I bought mine a week ago and I have yet to find a cell service that is fully compatible with the phone. some may be half compatible, but then you have to deal with your signal braking up and not being able to perform international calling. The phone looks great and sturdy, but is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fast awesome value for your dollar if you can get it to work no Sprint
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely hard to hate such a cool phone but there are still a lot of bugs as far as ports SIM card slots suck they don't really hold the card right they tend to pop loose also had many problems with Sprint cards do not work I've had a hard time getting incoming calls or internet service went outside of a router maybe sending it back try to Sprint and Verizon card I'm going to give it another day or two hopefully contact tech support from the company because Verizon has helped as much as I think they can but that is the way to go and I'm a Sprint guy
customer_reviews.author: brian bunner

customer_reviews.title: Is not compatible with Verizon
customer_reviews.text: On the surface, I loved everything about this phone. It's beefy which may translate to durability. Unfortunately however, I was unable to activate it because it's not compatible with Verizon. I bought it based on the description stating it's Verizon compatible, however, I went to three different stores and none were able to activate it, so I sent it back. I've got a buddy who owns one and he's really pleased with it (I don't recall who his carrier is). Based on his experience and from what I'd seen of the phone while I had it, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.text: Phone would not connect to data (Straight Talk Verizon & AT&T) despite being listed as an unlocked global compatibility phone. Tech support unable to help. Photo color was bad. Selfie photo quality was bad. Would not auto connect to WiFi with auto setting on. Would only send photos sporadically.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Negative: The first phone in received wouldn't charge, Amazon sent a replacement. The new phone charges fine but I'm not getting anywhere near the advertised battery life, probably closer to half that, little irritated but is what it is at this point, I do like this phone so I'm going to keep it. Positive: this thing is nice, feels good in the hands, has a lot of features flag ship phones tote at 1/3 of the price. It really is a nice phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tough with a lot of value
customer_reviews.text: this phone is freakin great for the money you pay you get alot of value back it runs every game i play smoothly no issues thats CODM, PUBG, Pokemon Go just to name a few the battery last all day playing and it's a beast at putting up with abuse i work construction and it falls ALOT and has NOT broken anything just minor scratches i dont very much like the camera and the finger print scanner which works good about 40% of the time the rest you have to go with your backup method but overall its a great phone
customer_reviews.author: israel tarango

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible, amazing battery life, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I went from charging my old phone 3 times a day to charging this phone once every 3 days. I usually spend about 1k for a new phone. Then get buyer's remorse because I paid so much for a fancy camera and I rarely take photos. Not that the camera is crap on this phone. I'm never going back to flagship phones.
customer_reviews.author: atenleggedninja

customer_reviews.title: Would have given it 5 stars but lacks Real-World solution
customer_reviews.text: Lacking accessories. Is there a recommended cases? Is there a recommended external speaker/microphone? All the photos show holding the unit in your hand as if this is the only way a walkie-talkie is used. There needs to be an external speaker/microphone and a case that allows a construction worker, doing delicate work requiring hands-on. The motion of reaching for your belt and holding a walkie-talkie in your hand is many times NOT practical or safe. It is best to have the walkie-talkie in a case (to protect it) on your belt and the external speaker/microphone clipped on the chest near the mouth so that simply keying the mic of the remote speaker/microphone will suffice for two-way communications.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael E. Alfau

customer_reviews.title: Its great for cooking meals on the fingerprint scanner.
customer_reviews.text: at first, the phone was decent at first. I had a few problems with it, but it was an android but after having it a couple months, my fingerprint scanner became super hot and its been burning me constantly. don't bother with support. it's practically non existent. they want me to send it overseas to either Hungary or China where i'm sure they're going to hold it hostage like what happened to my friends computer. Nothing is in english when it comes to any help videos on youtube or if it is, its poorly spoken. Support sent me a video in the first email to reset it but the reset menu is in Chinese. I don't trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great batery life and work with Verizon
customer_reviews.text: It's been a great phone. I'm using it with Verizon and works great. Best part I don't have to charge it for days
customer_reviews.author: pinky

customer_reviews.title: Good button a few issues for me.
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint ready is in a bad position or too sensitive. It tries to read while in my pocket all the time so it locks itself out and I still have to use my pin. Same with the ptt button. Constantly hit it and activates the walkie talkie app so I gotta turn it off. Other than those two issues I love the phone.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase this!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a heavy piece of crap, most notably. The technology feels like its from early 2000. The battery is decent. The biggest screwup is that when i place a call the screen goes black and i have no control of the phone for the duration of the call, no screen, no physical buttons on phone, NOTHING!!!??
customer_reviews.author: ajpomales

customer_reviews.title: Totally LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! The battery life is phenomenal,I've never had a phone with this much battery life! It's well made,tough,durable and so far it has worked flawlessly. My husband bought this for me and now he wants one too. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Silvey

customer_reviews.title: Disable dura speed setting!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for my needs, lasts a nice long time. Heads up though, if it kills apps you need to run in background, turn off the dira speed option in the settings, it closes everything that you aren't actively looking at. It took me a month to figure this out. Battery life App closing Force close apps Battery saver Background process Background apps I put in this list of keywords so hopefully no one else pulls their hair out over their email client force closing on them in background.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Ruggedness and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I deliberately not have a SIM card in the phone, as I wanted a rugged tablet the size of a phone that I use for certain apps. You may find this strange but sometimes I wished tablets that would be iPhone-sized be available to us.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Whatever screen I was in, it would take me back to home screen out of nowhere. Also, screenshot would stop working. Had to factory reset to fix. Did they over and over. Offered another one. It did it to. I wouldn’t recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Literally the best phone I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I'm a construction worker and break a lot of phones. This one has held up longer than any other. Great processing speed. Love the programmable button.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Brand new phone but it just randomly freezes than locks the phone. And it happens frequently. If I'm in the middle of a call or doing anything on the phone it'll freeze and turn off. Certainly not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Brandon schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the money. Dont miss the Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know if it would wrk on my network . But works on Verizon's as long as its unlocked. Far as the speed its alot more than will ever need. The Developer options are good and easyer to set up.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: this phone replaced my samsung note and its a whole lot better
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Morales

customer_reviews.title: Customer support refusing to reply
customer_reviews.text: This company is a fraudulent company. Phone died after 1.5 months. They refuse to honor the warranty. No response given. Stay away from all products of this company. Phone stopped charging after 1.5 months. Company refuses to email me back.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Antenna
customer_reviews.text: Amelia, I did not received the antenna with the phone, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: carlos castro

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this phone up, Was getting main brand phones and in my field of work(HVAC tech) they did not last, so this checked all the boxes,only problem is the screen could be brighter. When your on a roof in the sun its near impossible to see the screen, and the 2nd issue is the phone is pretty heavy, understand its mainly the big battery so not much that could be done for that.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Strike

customer_reviews.title: If you need a rugged phone with awesome battery life, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery and stays charged for days. Very rugged, good weight. Walkie talkie is a bit hard to set up with other handheld walkie talkies. Phone receives from other walkie talkies, but can’t get it to transmit out. Think it’s just the program that is confusing. Finger print reader had to turn it off because it’s always being activated, could be in a better spot. Great loud speaker and they s3nd plenty of extra screws and plugs. Overall, very happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty work phone!
customer_reviews.text: In our line of work we are often in and out of coverage areas, this phone allows us to use two SIM cards thereby widens our area of coverage. At first this phone was so big and heavy it was like a club. After handling it for a while you don’t notice the heft anymore. The PTT system is also pretty cool enabling us to talk instantly, over music and without interrupting what we’re doing. We’re thinking of buying the new model with three cameras for use as our office phone.
customer_reviews.author: WorleyLoggingLLC

customer_reviews.title: Didnt meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Pros: killler battery life, tough, duel SIM. Cons: dissapointing camera (flip phone bad), heavy as hell, outdated display, dissapoimting "toolbox"
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Blank screen while make or receiving calls
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to get my POS phone to work. I am not going to download an app to fix this problem. HEY SELLER TELL ME HOW TO GET MY SCREEN TO WORK, THIS IS BS.
customer_reviews.author: WASHINGTON POST IS FAKE NEWS

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: Antenna fell off and could never get the walkie talkie to work properly, It could receive but never send. Phone is huge as well
customer_reviews.author: Zak M.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed in one spot
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this phone ! If I had one thing negative to say it would be about its size doesn't fit in pockets very well but with it's built in clip it's easy to work with but the phone is always out where it can be seen .
customer_reviews.author: Bradford M Bridge III

customer_reviews.title: No headphone jack but otherwise yes it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So far the only two things I don't like is there is no headphone jack and how bad Google wants everybody's data.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian M.

customer_reviews.title: I need a refund o replacement not a refurbished but new one like I did it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone not more than 6 months , what the hell , what should I do know , take care f it more than a. iPhone and the supposed to be resistant. Someone can help me or should I just report this??
customer_reviews.author: oneil

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Phone
customer_reviews.text: You could hurt someone with this phone. It would be like throwing a brick. Setup was fast and easy. Phone is fast loading apps. Did not realize that there is a Ulephone 8 and a 9 coming soon. Sent phone back and waiting on the 9. Battery did not last as long as I thought it should. Had to charge again the day after I started to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel W.

customer_reviews.title: Tuff phone
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks very satisfied so far none of the problems others said they were having
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hardcore Phone
customer_reviews.text: Everyrhing about this phone is amazing. A little heavy but man never had a good phone like this ever will be sure to get from Ulefone again. The battery is amazing. Definetly waterproof and dust proof man i dropped cat litter on it it blew right off and out of the cracks. Phone still works!
customer_reviews.author: Justus griffin

customer_reviews.title: Phone
customer_reviews.text: Works great, great battery life, works great on my Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: chevyrebel97

customer_reviews.title: I returned a phone and I have not got refunded for either it or the warranty I bought
customer_reviews.text: The phone was not compatible with my carrier. Therefore, I had to return it. I returned a phone and I have not got refunded for either it or the warranty I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: It all fun and games till you're in bed watching youtube and this falls and slam on your face, 10 out of 10 would buy again. Ok real review this is 100% worth it from it durability and battery life it just great. Finger print scan needs work
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: NEED A NEW SCREEN AND DIGITIZER FOR THE PHONE.
customer_reviews.text: I DID THE CAR TEST ON THE PHONE AND THE SCREEN BROOK. BEEN TRYING TO GET ANOTHER SCREEN, BUT CAN’T FINE ANY.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ojims

customer_reviews.title: Good phone with great battery.
customer_reviews.text: The lighting on the front camera is bad unless you're outside but the back camera was excellent not anymore. Overall a good phone with awesome battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey rabbits

customer_reviews.title: Problem with battery
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Everything I wanted. But it's not a fast charging phone. It takes hours to charge even 5 percent.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Armor 3wt
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT secured No demage After 30 min of charge like they recomended i put sim card and sd and works PERFECT 3rd day and works PERFECT Lov it
customer_reviews.author: Sylwester K.

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Used a straight talk sim card through at&t. Had to modify the apn for the internet usage. Overall it's a great device . Fingerprint reader is very sensitive and can be quite picky but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected well built great battery life a little heavy but can be use as a weapon!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Hewlett

customer_reviews.title: Terrible phone.
customer_reviews.text: terrible phone. I threw away my money when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Banegas

customer_reviews.title: Worst cellphone and software
customer_reviews.text: This cellphone is a completely fraud. They advertise software works with att and it is a lie. I am not able to use my phone or internet service because constantly desconection of the tower
customer_reviews.author: Anthony paez

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but I was told that it would be compatible with my carrier but it only works for texting and calls I cant use the internet with out wifi witch is a waste when I am not any wear near wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aint Gonna Miss the Old Phone Any Time Soon
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly rugged, amplified speakers, simple to use, outrageously long battery life, and very convenient. Really loving this phone so far. Here's hoping this will last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Gift for Grandson, he tried to take underwater photos in pool. Worked first time but leaked the second time. Not so waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Schnizer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone its a brick but if u break phones as i do all the time get this one its worth it ....the finger print scan works 50% of the time but thats not a deal breaker for me
customer_reviews.author: elijah teel

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Antenna broke within 3 days.. don't use screen protector, if you do while on a call screen will go black. It's makes the proximity sensor malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's all said in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Phone is built like tank toughest most durable phone hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Phone is awful for making calls. Terrible. Verizon service sux also
customer_reviews.author: russ hall

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Durable
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. It's a bit heavy, but I like that. I'm not concerned about damage if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT phone!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone....and the support is nothing short of awesome......would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Shirey

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: walkie talkie wont connect can hear other person but they cant hear me
customer_reviews.author: thirdworld tester

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with Verizon. On straight talk signal is very weak
customer_reviews.author: bryce

customer_reviews.title: crap
customer_reviews.text: 3 months in charger port stops working a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: RONY M.

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Phone is built like an armor truck and works just as good I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Verizon network.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because it said it would work with my Verizon sim chip and it did not! I went to Verizon today, got another sim chip for my previous galaxy s9plus and tried it again, did not work. I had Verizon scan the back of my newly purchased ulefone and they showed me on their tablet that this phone will not work on their network. The seller has emailed me and assured me it would work. It did not work. Unless a miracle happens, this phone is going back. I really liked the ruggedness and features along with the huge battery but it wasn't meant to happen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: This phone works with Verizon.
customer_reviews.text: This phone has an amazing rugged feel to it. The speed, phone call quality, battery, features, and camera are better than an iphone. I have no doubts this will withstand the millions of drops it will get or the endless dunks of water it will encounter. You have no reason to waste your money on a Samsung, iPhone, HTC, Motorola, etc with durable phones like this around.
customer_reviews.author: Adderton 7157

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, easy setup and file transfer if backed up. Using the Verizon network and wifi all I had to do was move my sim card to the new phone and it took over. Compared to other phones I've had this one is solid, heavy and well place controls. It's fast and easy to use. This does not have the head phone jack but you get an adapter that converts the C charger port to the 3.5mm jack to plug in to. It's not overloaded with apps you'll never use taking up needed storage space. I'm very happy with my purchase and that I didn't have to spend $800 or more.
customer_reviews.author: Allen P.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the switch
customer_reviews.text: Have had this phone for close to a month and had to update how great the battery is. Three days normal use before I have to charge. Already used to the weight of the phone also. Great phone!!! Received this phone 2 days ago. Very pleased so far. Phone comes with everything you need and then some. The switch from my Stylo4 was easy. The only con at this point is the weight of the phone. Very heavy but easy to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Major step-down but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After using flagships for the last ten years, the specs are a major step down. The fingerprint sensor is also super annoying...should have been placed at the back. the camera is a JOKE. the sefile camera especially, has a reddish tint... and super grainy in low light. Nevertheless, five stars still. It delivers on its promise. super rugged phone, water proof, MASSIVE battery... goes for days without recharging. that's what i bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life and Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd ulefone and I like everyone of them. I had an RFinder $900 radio/phone that was super buggy. I bought this 3WT so I could have a radio again and while it is not DMR it is fully 440-470mhz capable and it has built in presets for GMFRS/FRS so you can use it with your family radios. Battery life is almost 7 days for me. The camera is great at up close photos. Overall a great phone and a great price, buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Daren

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Loving this phone. Had to turn of the finger print reader because it tries to read constantly and it's really annoying. Face recognition works very well. Battery lasts about 3 days before needing a charge on somewhat heavy use. Camera is great though using Snapchat and such it automatically sharpens the image and it looks awful.
customer_reviews.author: sailingjacobe

customer_reviews.title: Ofcourse it's heavier,,..
customer_reviews.text: Buying this phone has something more you have accept which is weight, it's heavier than any phone but fine for toigh guy's, it is as heavy as a powerbank 10k. Best wishes.
customer_reviews.author: issam

customer_reviews.title: Durable phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, battery life is great, only problem with phone is fingerprint recognition, too sensitive. I want to use to use my phone, only about 30 percent effective
customer_reviews.author: m.ches

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: This has been by far the best phone I have ever owned It has great camar the battery will last 3 day's or more with out charging I work in construction and give it a hard live and it's a very resistant phone I recommend it 100% I get complements on it all the time I have taken some pictures under water also it's just great all the way. It comes with a glass protector a bike adapter charger and much more.
customer_reviews.author: leila naydali

customer_reviews.title: Just I don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: Nop. I totally hate camera in the night, no focusing. During the day it is soso... For this price better iphone or other android.
customer_reviews.author: Birute

customer_reviews.title: Built like a Battleship
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back due to its weight and size. Weighs a pound and its Chinese so I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Dropped the phone from 2 feet and the camera went out of whack. Had it completely sealed properly sitting on the side of the tub and the water ruined the speaker. The phone does not work like described.
customer_reviews.author: B Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Verizon
customer_reviews.text: I use this phone with Verizon works fine.... The speakers are amazing... Love this phone and the big ass-battery..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from an iPhone and was not sure how I would like an Android. So far I like it. Love the battery life! I charged it once and it has been 3 days, still at 50%
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Trosclair

customer_reviews.title: worked with my Verizon
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a rugged phone that would work with Verizon - the 3WT did not disappoint. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Worm

customer_reviews.title: Good tough well built
customer_reviews.text: Great phone so far heavy but battery lasts for days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ulefone Armor 3WT Rugged Cell Phones Unlocked, IP68 Walkie Talkie Waterproof Smartphone, 10300mAh, 5.7 Inch, 6GB + 64GB, Android 9.0, 4G Dual SIM, Compass NFC GPS OTG Shockproof, Dustproof (Orange)
feature_bullets: 【Smart Walkie Talkie】Armor 3WT is a revolutionary mobile phone with built in walkie talkie function, supports 1W/2W hardware radios (400-470MHz). Supports automatic record and Bluetooth with a range of over 5 miles and connection to other Armor 3WT phones and to standard walkie talkie units. The antenna is detachable from the rugged cell phone when you don’t need walkie talkie functions.

【US Military MIL-STD-810G Certified】Highest IP68/IP69K rating, it can handle 2 hours of immersion in 2 meters of water, or 24 hours of submission in 1 meter of concrete. Fitting the temperature ranges from -4°F (-20°C) to 140°F (60°C) , this rugged cell phone could work in all geographical environments. With water-resistance, dust-resistance, shock-resistance, Armor 3WT will protect himself all round and then standby your side to support you.

【10300 mAh Battery and PE+ 9V/2.0 Fast Charge】Ultra long-life battery for tons of screen-time on a single charge and ultra power saving mode to extend your charge even longer. With advanced PE+2.0 and 9V/2A fast charging technology (18W, Reverse charger supported), from dead to a full charge only takes a few hours.

【5.7-inch Screen + 18:9 FHD Display + Corning Gorilla 5】With a 5.7" 18:9 all-screen design and 2160 x 1080 FHD+ resolution, plus a scratch resistance Corning Gorilla 5 Glass, Armor 3WT will bring you an immersive visual experience, and no worry about any unexpected damage. We even tested it by driving nails, smashing ice and cracking walnuts with the screen.

【Global Frequency Bands】The advantage of Armor 3WT is it has 35 network bands in 6 types around the world, covering major network providers in the US, Canada, Mexico, Asia, Europe and South Americas. Support dual Sim Dual Standby with 4G network. It can work with main carriers such as AT&T, T-mobile, Verizon, Metro PCS&etc(does NOT support Sprint). If your Armor 3T can't connect data or no signal, please send a email to us for support and we will help you activate the phone.
